> When they did find defects using this technique, they
> were usually unable to reproduce them because they couldn't remember the
> exact steps they had followed to get where they were.

A good logging strategy would have certainly helped.  For example having 
a detailed log of the invoked methods (with parameters) should enable 
you to reproduce what happened.

-Vladimir
